text: is a Japanese politician. He was the Minister of Defense from September 2023 until October 2024. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He is also in the House of Representatives. Following a cabinet reshuffle on 13 September 2023, he was appointed minister of defense. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Defense ministers of Japan Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
title: Minoru Kihara (politician)
